languages.text: "Вот что случается, когда идешь против воли Неумирающего. Эвейн пытался спасти того, чье имя уже прозвучало".
"This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."
languages.original_text: "Вот что случается, когда идешь против воли Неумирающего. Эвейн пытался спасти того, чье имя уже прозвучало".

traits.locale_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."

traits.locale_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."

traits.locale_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Das geschieht, wenn man sich dem Willen des Todlosen widersetzt. Evayne hat versucht, jemanden zu retten, dessen Name bereits ausgesprochen worden war."
languages.original_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."

traits.locale_text: "Das geschieht, wenn man sich dem Willen des Todlosen widersetzt. Evayne hat versucht, jemanden zu retten, dessen Name bereits ausgesprochen worden war."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà ce qui se passe lorsqu'on va à l'encontre de la volonté de l'Immortel. Evayne s'évertuait à vouloir sauver quelqu'un dont le nom avait déjà été prononcé. »
languages.original_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà ce qui se passe lorsqu'on va à l'encontre de la volonté de l'Immortel. Evayne s'évertuait à vouloir sauver quelqu'un dont le nom avait déjà été prononcé. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Esto sucede por actuar en contra de la voluntad del Inmortal. Evayne buscaba salvar a alguien cuyo nombre ya había sido pronunciado».
languages.original_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."

traits.locale_text: «Esto sucede por actuar en contra de la voluntad del Inmortal. Evayne buscaba salvar a alguien cuyo nombre ya había sido pronunciado».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「不死の者の意思に反して行動するとこうなるのね。エヴァインは、すでにその名が語られた人物を救おうとしていたわ」
languages.original_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者の意思に反して行動するとこうなるのね。エヴァインは、すでにその名が語られた人物を救おうとしていたわ」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “这就是忤逆不死之神意愿的下场。艾维尼试图救回那个人，但不死之神已经说出了那个人的名字。”
languages.original_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."

traits.locale_text: “这就是忤逆不死之神意愿的下场。艾维尼试图救回那个人，但不死之神已经说出了那个人的名字。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "This is what happens when you act against the will of the Undying One. Evayne was trying to save someone whose name had already been spoken."
